replies.body:
New headcanon that Lux's ult isn't intentional. It's just something scaring her into doing it.

Half the time it's a mosquito flying a LITTTLLE bit too close.

demacia's finest bug zapper! you can buy your own for only 3150 ip at a store near you!

Pre-order yours and get 2 "probably poros" absolutely free! {{champion:201}}approved!

 **But Wait!** Call in the next 10 minutes and {{champion:28}} will deliver it to your door personally!!

> *Poros shipped separately at buyer's expense. Availability may vary. Rito games is not responsible for anything that happens to anyone who encounters The Widow Maker. Do not drink or use drugs while using Demacia's finest bug zapper(DFBZ). Should you injure yourself while using DFBZ, please find the nearest forums and post so people can properly laugh at how much of a newb you are.*

Hey, you -logic seeker- we don't take kindly to your kind in these parts! Now, settle down and watch Gnar pretend he's fiddlesticks.

Gnar throwing rocks at zeds shadow?
How'bout {{champion:150}} see's {{champion:238}} 's shadow defeat someone then turn around and be afraid of his own shadow
How about {{champion:150}} Sees {{champion:238}}  playing rock, Paper Scissors with His Shadow Then {{champion:150}}  Tries it with His own.
